messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Gaelic
messages.msgSnippet: The person I use is Donald McDonald, and his web address is www.minet.ca/~donaldm/ .  He is a Scots Gaelic speaker, but I believe there is some information on
messages.messageBody:
The person I use is Donald McDonald, and his web address is
www.minet.ca/~donaldm/ . He is a Scots Gaelic speaker, but I believe there
is some information on Irish Gaelic there also.

Dia

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Gaelic
messages.msgSnippet: Dia, I am coming along sooooo slowly in Irish compared to my 13 yo son! I wish I had taken it when I was younger! How are you doing your language study? I go
messages.messageBody:
Dia, I am coming along sooooo slowly in Irish compared to my 13 yo son! I
wish I had taken it when I was younger! How are you doing your language
study? I go to an A.O.H.(Ancient Order of Hibernians) and the lessons start
with phonetics and move on to grammar and conversations. I have been going
forever and all I can say is hi and I am fine! LOL!
Bridget
